Generation VII.Sun: This Pokémon is a coward. As it desperately dashes off, the flailing of its many legs leaves a sparkling clean path in its wake.
Generation VII.Moon: Its habitat varies from beaches to seabeds. A natural scavenger, it will gleefully chow down on anything edible, no matter how rotten.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It will pick up anything it finds on the ground. Sometimes it finds coins, so Murkrow and Meowth will go after it.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: An astonishingly cowardly Pokémon, Wimpod will whir its legs at high speeds to run away if anything comes near it.

Generation VIII.Sword: It's nature's cleaner—it eats anything and everything, including garbage and rotten things. The ground near its nest is always clean.
Generation VIII.Shield: Wimpod gather in swarms, constantly on the lookout for danger. They scatter the moment they detect an enemy's presence.

Generation VII.Sun: Route 8 , Poni Breaker Coast , Poni Wilds
Generation VII.Moon: Route 8 , Poni Breaker Coast , Poni Wilds
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Dividing Peak Tunnel , Route 8 , Poni Breaker Coast
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Dividing Peak Tunnel , Route 8 , Poni Breaker Coast

Generation VIII.Sword: Galar Mine No. 2 , Giant's Mirror , Hammerlocke Hills , Motostoke Riverbank , Bridge Field Rolling Fields , Dappled Grove , South Lake Miloch , Bridge Field ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Galar Mine No. 2 , Giant's Mirror , Hammerlocke Hills , Motostoke Riverbank , Bridge Field Rolling Fields , Dappled Grove , South Lake Miloch , Bridge Field ( Max Raid Battle )
